Texts.Chs: 洞穴就像你看到的那个，是吗？喵有一个想法。凯文做实验，试图追随你的脚步。一切都错了。也许他觉得太无聊了？
Texts.Eng: Cave was like one you saw, yes? Mew had a thought. Kevin experiments, tries following in your footsteps. Everything goes wrong. Maybe he got bored?

Texts.Chs: 凯文触摸到了水晶。无疑是这样。旧的签名，微弱，但很清晰。也许是凯文的错，事情出了差错。有另一个信标。
Texts.Eng: Kevin touched crystals. No doubt about it. Old signature, faint, but clear. Maybe Kevin's fault things went wrong. Have another beacon.

Texts.Chs: 把^orange;极暗厄尔吉斯水晶^green;带给位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;的^orange;溪^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^green;Bring^reset; the ^orange;Dark Erchius Crystals^reset; to ^orange;Kherae^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: ^green;从^orange;极暗厄尔吉斯开采设施^reset;夺取^orange;极暗厄尔吉斯水晶^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^green;Fetch ^orange;Dark Erchius Crystals^reset; from the ^orange;Dark Erchius Mining Facility^reset;
